workflows.name: Bilko Echo Test
workflows.description: Verifies end-to-end connectivity between Bilko and n8n. Sends a test payload to the n8n webhook and confirms the round-trip response is received correctly. Use this to validate that the n8n integration is properly configured and responding.
workflows.instructions: Click 'Execute' to send a test message to n8n. The workflow will echo back your message with a timestamp, confirming the connection is working.

workflows.name: [PROD] European Football Daily
workflows.description: PRODUCTION workflow. Daily automated European football news aggregation. Runs at 00:00 to search the last 24 hours of European football news, identifies the most positive/cheerful event using sentiment analysis, generates an AI image, and publishes a congratulatory post with AI transparency disclosure.
workflows.instructions: This is the PRODUCTION workflow. It runs automatically at 00:00 daily via n8n Schedule Trigger. Uses fixed callback URL to bilkobibitkov.replit.app. For testing, use the DEV workflow instead.

workflows.name: [DEV] European Football Daily
workflows.description: DEVELOPMENT workflow. Same pipeline as PROD but with dynamic callback URLs and manual trigger only. Use this for testing new features before promoting to PROD.
workflows.instructions: Manual execution only. Uses dynamic callback URLs so it works with any Replit dev domain. Both DEV and PROD can be active simultaneously (different webhook paths).
